  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(double size, PositionComponent position, DrawingComponent drawingComponent, InputComponent playerInputComponent, MovementComponent movementComponent, WeaponComponent weaponComponent, HitboxComponent hitboxComponent)
      Creates a Player entity with the specified position, drawing, and input components.
      Parameters:
      size - The size of the player.
      position - The PositionComponent defining the player's position and rotation in the game world.
      drawingComponent - The DrawingComponent responsible for rendering the player entity.
      playerInputComponent - The PlayerInputComponent managing the player's input and movement logic.
      movementComponent - The MovementComponent managing the player's movement logic.
      weaponComponent - The WeaponComponent used for attacking.
      hitboxComponent - The HitboxComponent used for collision detection.

  • Method Details

    • takeHit

      public void takeHit(GameData gameData)
      Description copied from class: Entity
      Called whenever a HitboxComponent trigger hit. Default implementation removes the entity from the game world.
      Overrides:
      takeHit in class Entity
      Parameters:
      gameData - The GameData instance containing the game world.
